description: Body temperature in degrees Celsius, measured via any clinical method (oral, axillary, tympanic, rectal, or core). The measurement site or device type should be indicated in meas_site_name.
Heart rate in beats per minute (bpm), obtained from monitor, pulse oximeter, or manual palpation.
Systolic blood pressure. Can include both invasive (arterial line) and non-invasive (cuff) measurements; specify in meas_site_name.
Diastolic blood pressure. Can include both invasive (arterial line) and non-invasive (cuff) measurements; specify in meas_site_name.
Peripheral oxygen saturation (%), typically measured by pulse oximetry.
Number of breaths per minute, either manually counted or obtained from a monitor.
Can include both invasive (arterial line) and non-invasive (cuff) measurements. Source type should be indicated in meas_site_name.
Patient’s height in centimeters, measured or recorded at admission or encounter.
Patient’s weight in kilograms, measured or recorded at admission or encounter.
